title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: The Host
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Julia Turner discuss The Host, a Korean monster movie that's so much more. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
